metadata.title: CVE-2018-11214 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libjpeg 9a. The get_text_rgb_row function in rdppm.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (Segmentation fault) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-11214` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5
libturbojpeg - 1.5.2-0ubuntu5
No subscription required

libjpeg-progs - 1:9c-2
libjpeg9 - 1:9c-2
No subscription required

notes.note: jdstrand> libjpeg-turbo is a fork of libjpeg8 mdeslaur> same fix as CVE-2016-3616 same commit as CVE-2018-11213

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.2-0ubuntu5').
libjpeg6b package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
libjpeg9 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:9c-2').
